lore: The Spelljugglers are a mercenary group that will join any cause as long as the reward is right.\n\nThe Spelljuggler Trapezists specialize in trickery, but they reserve these skills for shady organizations. Thanks to their powers, they can unlock hidden potential in their allies' minds, abilities that would normally stay dormant.
menagerieDialog: (It's lazily floating a single spell orb above its palm.)
Watch as I juggle their lives away!
I know spells that would make your head spin... literally!
Can't hit what you can't catch! My defenses are impenetrable!
(It's tossing spells from hand to hand at dizzying speeds.)
name: Spelljuggler Trapezist
